encounter: Ahead, there is a powerful, magical barrier blocking passage blocking your path. Perhaps it's related to your quest to retrieve a stolen pearl from a cunning group of bandits..

The presence of a thick forest of kelp that entangles ships makes it difficult to proceed. Perhaps the kraken nearby can help.

You hear the distant call of a solitary hawk soaring above coming from a hidden campsite in the midst of a highland forest.

You see a bundle of rare and aromatic herbs that could be useful in your quest to defend a remote settlement from an approaching pack of wolves.. But it's guarded by a group of friendly and nature-loving wood elves.

With discover the source of a mysterious bioluminescent phenomenon. On your mind, the sudden appearance of a massive, ancient sea turtle that won't move accompanied by rustling of seaweed swaying in the current becomes a challenging diversion.
